content:
Oscar the Shark 
 Ethan Alberts 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Oscar has a problem with 
 
 his eyes. 
 
 
 
 He canot se any fish. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 But he wil not eat his 
 
 carots. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Johnie the seahorse says, 
 
 “Oscar, eat your carots!” 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 But Oscar does not like the 
 
 taste of carots. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 “Carots wil help you to 
 
 se beter,” says Johnie. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Oscar goes to the doctor. 
 
 
 
 Oscar and Johnie wait for 
 
 Dr Shakes. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Dr Shakes says, “Glases 
 
 wil help you to se beter.” 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Oscar does not want to 
 
 wear glases. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 But the glases help Oscar 
 
 se the fishes. 
 
 
 
 Now he eats his carots 
 
 with fish! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 9
